name: Totem Lamp
description: The Totem Lamp is a playful piece with its rotating parts. Handmade with shagreen, bronze-patina brass, it measures 35 x 35 x 71 cm (shade included). To maintain, wipe clean with a soft dry cloth. Made in the Philippines. Kifu Paris emphasizes the use of natural components in their designs, which might cause variations in color but highlights the authenticity of their luxurious products.
